name: Grab Jobs
description: We develop technology that helps companies automate the repetitive and time-consuming stages of the recruitment process.GrabJobs caters for entry to mid-level jobs across companies of all sizes in all industries.
features: Provide all types of job options
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Save time. Save cost
ShortDescription: GrabJobs is an end-to-end Hiring Automation platform enabling employers and job seekers to connect seamlessly.

Highlights.name: Wide Marketplace
Highlights.description: There are currently over 57,000 remote job openings.

Highlights.name: Wide Variety
Highlights.description: Some of the most popular remote jobs are customer service, administrative, marketing, sales, and software developer jobs

enhanced_description: GrabJobs is an end-to-end Hiring Automation platform designed to help companies automate repetitive and time-consuming stages of the recruitment process, ultimately enabling employers and job seekers to connect seamlessly. It caters to entry to mid-level jobs across companies of all sizes and industries globally, supporting operations in multiple countries. The platform leverages AI-powered job search to enhance hiring speed and efficiency, aiming to save time and cost for employers. It features a wide marketplace for various job options, including over 57,000 remote job openings across popular roles like customer service, administrative, marketing, sales, and software developer.
key_use_cases: Finding and hiring for entry to mid-level positions
competitive_advantages: Supports companies of all sizes and industries
Operates in multiple countries for global reach
Specialization in entry to mid-level jobs
Focus on automating repetitive recruitment tasks
Wide marketplace with extensive remote job openings
